alert.note: Alert for Butler; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 3:31AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sedgwick and west central Butler Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 331 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Northeast Wichita, or over Bel Aire, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Andover, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Towanda, Benton, Kechi, Eastborough, Northeast Wichita, East Wichita and Jabara Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 10 and 15. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 56 and 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
